definition: a small or medium size container for holding or carrying things, swell or protrude outwards
details:
noun
- a small or medium size container for holding or carrying things
- (anatomy) saclike structure in any of various animals (as a marsupial or gopher or pelican)
= synonyms: pocket
- an enclosed space
= synonyms: sack
verb
- swell or protrude outwards
= synonyms: bulge, protrude
- send by special mail that goes through diplomatic channels
- put into a small bag
